text: A dealership is a type of business which sells certain items. These items may include automobiles, boats, other vehicles, manufactured homes or appliances. Car dealerships are a very common form of dealership. The often sell either new or used automobiles. They will often also provide repairs to vehicles. New car dealerships most often only sell and repair vehicles from a specific maker. Used car dealership will often sell vehicles from many different makers and are less likely to provide repairs. Category:Companies Category:Automobiles
title: Dealership
